articles.title: Niger coup: Is France to blame for instability in West Africa? - BBC
articles.description: The recent wave of military takeovers have all been in former French colonies - is this a coincidence?
articles.content: Niger has become the latest country in West Africa where the army has seized control, following Burkina Faso, Guinea, Mali, and Chad - all former French colonies. Since 1990, a striking 78% of the 27… [+7703 chars]
